Docs.summary: Returns the error stream if the connection failed but the server sent useful data nonetheless.
Docs.value: an error stream if any, null if there have been no errors, the connection is not connected or the server sent no useful data.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool FollowRedirects { get; set; }
member this.FollowRedirects : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: Returns a boolean indicating whether or not HTTP redirects (3xx) should be automatically followed. -or- Sets whether HTTP redirects (requests with response code 3xx) should be automatically followed by this class.
Docs.value: true if HTTP redirects should be automatically followed, false if not.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string RequestMethod { get; set; }
member this.RequestMethod : string with get, set

Docs.summary:
Get the request method. -or- Set the method for the URL request, one of:
  • GET
  • POST
  • HEAD
  • OPTIONS
  • PUT
  • DELETE
  • TRACE
are legal, subject to protocol restrictions.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetChunkedStreamingMode(int32 chunklen) cil managed
abstract member SetChunkedStreamingMode : int -> unit override this.SetChunkedStreamingMode : int -> unit

Docs.param: The number of bytes to write in each chunk. If chunklen is less than or equal to zero, a default value will be used.
Docs.summary: This method is used to enable streaming of a HTTP request body without internal buffering, when the content length is not known in advance.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if already connected or another mode already set.
if URLConnection is already connected or if a different streaming mode is already enabled.
